00036 namespace co
00037 {
00038 namespace detail { class DataIStream; }
00039 
00041 class DataIStream
00042 {
00043 public:
00047     virtual size_t nRemainingBuffers() const = 0;
00048 
00049     virtual uint128_t getVersion() const = 0; 
00050     virtual void reset() { _reset(); } 
00051     void setSwapping( const bool onOff ); 
00052     CO_API bool isSwapping() const; 
00053     DataIStream& operator = ( const DataIStream& rhs ); 
00054 
00055 
00059     template< typename T > T read()
00060         { T value; *this >> value; return value; }
00061 
00063     template< class T > DataIStream& operator >> ( T& value )
00064         { _read( &value, sizeof( value )); _swap( value ); return *this; }
00065 
00067     template< class T > DataIStream& operator >> ( Array< T > array )
00068         { _readArray( array, boost::is_pod<T>( )); return *this; }
00069 
00071     template< class T > DataIStream& operator >> ( lunchbox::Buffer< T >& );
00072 
00074     template< class T > DataIStream& operator >> ( std::vector< T >& );
00075 
00077     template< class K, class V >
00078     DataIStream& operator >> ( std::map< K, V >& );
00079 
00081     template< class T > DataIStream& operator >> ( std::set< T >& );
00082 
00084     template< class K, class V >
00085     DataIStream& operator >> ( stde::hash_map< K, V >& );
00086 
00088     template< class T > DataIStream& operator >> ( stde::hash_set< T >& );
00089 
00095 #  ifdef CO_IGNORE_BYTESWAP
00096 
00097     template< class T > static void swap( T& ) { /* nop */ }
00098 #  else
00099 
00100     template< class T > static void swap( T& v ) { lunchbox::byteswap(v); }
00101 #  endif
00102 
00114     template< typename O, typename C >
00115     void deserializeChildren( O* object, const std::vector< C* >& old,
00116                               std::vector< C* >& result );
00117 
00137     CO_API const void* getRemainingBuffer( const uint64_t size );
00138 
00143     CO_API uint64_t getRemainingBufferSize();
00144 
00146     bool wasUsed() const;
00147 
00149     bool hasData() { return _checkBuffer(); }
00150 
00152     CO_API virtual NodePtr getRemoteNode() const = 0;
00153 
00155     CO_API virtual LocalNodePtr getLocalNode() const = 0;
00157 
00158 protected:
00161     CO_API DataIStream( const bool swap );
00162     DataIStream( const DataIStream& );
00163     CO_API virtual ~DataIStream();
00164 
00165     virtual bool getNextBuffer( uint32_t& compressor, uint32_t& nChunks,
00166                                 const void** chunkData, uint64_t& size )=0;
00168 
00169 private:
00170     detail::DataIStream* const _impl;
00171 
00173     CO_API void _read( void* data, uint64_t size );
00174 
00179     CO_API bool _checkBuffer();
00180     CO_API void _reset();
00181 
00182     const uint8_t* _decompress( const void* data, const uint32_t name,
00183                                 const uint32_t nChunks,
00184                                 const uint64_t dataSize );
00185 
00187     template< class T >
00188     DataIStream& _readFlatVector ( std::vector< T >& value )
00189     {
00190         uint64_t nElems = 0;
00191         *this >> nElems;
00192         LBASSERTINFO( nElems < LB_BIT48,
00193                       "Out-of-sync DataIStream: " << nElems << " elements?" );
00194         value.resize( size_t( nElems ));
00195         if( nElems > 0 )
00196             *this >> Array< T >( &value.front(), nElems );
00197         return *this;
00198     }
00199 
00201     template< class T > void _swap( T& value ) const
00202         { if( isSwapping( )) swap( value ); }
00203 
00205     template< class T > void _readArray( Array< T >, const boost::true_type& );
00206 
00208     template< class T > void _readArray( Array< T >, const boost::false_type&);
00209 
00211     template< class T > void _swap( Array< T > array ) const
00212     {
00213         if( !isSwapping( ))
00214             return;
00215 #pragma omp parallel for
00216         for( ssize_t i = 0; i < ssize_t( array.num ); ++i )
00217             swap( array.data[i] );
00218     }
00219 };
00220 }
